name: Big Beautiful Cthulhu
description:
Big Beautiful Cthulhu is our submission for the Epic Mega Jam 2021 - 'Running out of space'

Play as Cthulhu, floating in space while eating celestial bodies, becoming fatter and fatter until you run out of space. However, be wary of blackholes and stars, for they will slenderize you!
It's an old school arcade inspired game, in a 2.5D world.
Switch seamlessly between mouse and controller at any time.

List of assets used from external sources:
Font       -      x-typewriter     Open Font License
Sample packs that were used to make some of the sound effects:
'Heavyocity - Damage' and "99Sounds - Cinematic Sound Effects"

Other than this, all 2D and 3D assets were made by Kevin Stark during the game-Jam, using Maya, Zbrush, Photoshop, NormalMapOnline, and of course UE4.

All music was composed by Daniel Manthe during the game-jam, as well as the sound effects with the help of some sample packs (using FL Studio 20), and voice acting was done by both team members.
